name: Funny Farm Learning Games for Toddlers and Kids
name_original: Funny Farm Learning Games for Toddlers and Kids
description:
Looking for the ultimate educational game for young children?




Does your child like animated puzzles and want to learn their first colors, shapes and sizes? Then get your child our new Farm Games educational game, which includes different animated game levels.



Your child will learn, among other things, the following things while solving the animated puzzles:

* Logical thinking
* First objects, shapes and colors
* Hand-eye coordination
* Goal-oriented thinking
* How to use the computer mouse and PC
* Decision-making skills
* Reward in the form of a bonus game: A memory game to play against a cat AI!



The Farm children's game is the perfect game for all parents who want to give their child fun and learning at the same time!

In the game, children can choose between different games. There are levels for learning different object shapes with a farm theme. There are also levels for learning colors and sizes.
Successfully solved puzzle games reward your child with a star. These can be collected and, in a certain number, unlock a bonus game: a memory game that can be played against a virtual cat (AI).
Fun and motivation are therefore guaranteed.

Important: The game contains no links or advertising and is completely safe for children!

Surprise your child today with our fun farm learning game.

Your McPeppergames team
